Posts.Content: leelee32 wrote: Hi, Where to begin okay...so I am a cancer surviver who just got diagnosed with breast cancer do to radiation therapy I received when I was 14 years old.  I am going to do a Bi-Lateral nipple sparing mastectomy in about 2 weeks and was wondering if any one had this procedure done and can share some info.  I know what to expect from the doctors point of view but not from someone who actually has gone through it.    Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nipple sparing mastectomy leelee32 Pawprint
